General.Name: Firefox Gold Corp
General.Description: FireFox Gold Corp. engages in the exploration and development of gold deposits in Finland. It holds a 100% interest in the Jeesiö gold project located in Lapland; and the Mustajärvi gold project situated in northern Finland. The company was formerly known as Silverstone Resources Corp. and changed its name to FireFox Gold Corp. in August 2017. FireFox Gold Corp. was incorporated in 2017 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
